title: Steins;Gate
synopsis: A self-proclaimed mad scientist discovers time travel through a microwave.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist
synopsis: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone.

title: Death Note
synopsis: A high school student finds a supernatural notebook.

title: Attack on Titan
synopsis: Humanity fights for survival against giant humanoid creatures.

title: Code Geass
